optionalFlags.name: --json
optionalFlags.description: Format output as json.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --template
optionalFlags.description: Template to use for file creation. Supplied parameter values or default values are filled into a copy of the template. Permissible values are: ApexException, ApexUnitTest, BasicUnitTest, DefaultApexClass, InboundEmailService. Default value: DefaultApexClass.

optionalFlags.name: --output-dir
optionalFlags.description: Directory for saving the created files. The location can be an absolute path or relative to the current working directory. The default is the current directory.

optionalFlags.name: --api-version
optionalFlags.description: Override the api version used for api requests made by this command.

requiredFlags.name: --name
requiredFlags.description: Name of the generated Apex class. The name can be up to 40 characters and must start with a letter.

optionalFlags.name: --json
optionalFlags.description: Format output as json.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --template
optionalFlags.description: Template to use for file creation. Supplied parameter values or default values are filled into a copy of the template. Permissible values are: ApexTrigger. Default value: ApexTrigger.

optionalFlags.name: --output-dir
optionalFlags.description: Directory for saving the created files. The location can be an absolute path or relative to the current working directory. The default is the current directory.

optionalFlags.name: --api-version
optionalFlags.description: Override the api version used for api requests made by this command.

optionalFlags.name: --sobject
optionalFlags.description: Salesforce object to generate a trigger on. Default value: SOBJECT.

optionalFlags.name: --event
optionalFlags.description: Events that fire the trigger. Permissible values are: before insert, before update, before delete, after insert, after update, after delete, after undelete. Default value: before insert.

requiredFlags.name: --name
requiredFlags.description: Name of the generated Apex trigger. The name can be up to 40 characters and must start with a letter.

commands.name: apex get log
commands.description: Fetch the specified log or given number of most recent logs from the org.

optionalFlags.name: --json
optionalFlags.description: Format output as json.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --api-version
optionalFlags.description: Override the api version used for api requests made by this command.

optionalFlags.name: --log-id
optionalFlags.description: ID of the specific log to display.

optionalFlags.name: --number
optionalFlags.description: Number of the most recent logs to display.

optionalFlags.name: --output-dir
optionalFlags.description: Directory for saving the log files. The location can be an absolute path or relative to the current working directory. The default is the current directory.

requiredFlags.name: --target-org
requiredFlags.description: Username or alias of the target org. Not required if the target-org configuration variable is already set.

commands.name: apex get test
commands.description: Display test results for a specific asynchronous test run.

optionalFlags.name: --json
optionalFlags.description: Format output as json.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --api-version
optionalFlags.description: Override the api version used for api requests made by this command.

optionalFlags.name: --code-coverage
optionalFlags.description: Retrieve code coverage results.

optionalFlags.name: --detailed-coverage
optionalFlags.description: Display detailed code coverage per test.

optionalFlags.name: --output-dir
optionalFlags.description: Directory in which to store test result files.

optionalFlags.name: --result-format
optionalFlags.description: Format of the test results. Permissible values are: human, tap, junit, json. Default value: human.

optionalFlags.name: --concise
optionalFlags.description: Display only failed test results; works with human-readable output only.

requiredFlags.name: --target-org
requiredFlags.description: Username or alias of the target org. Not required if the target-org configuration variable is already set.

commands.name: apex list log
commands.description: Display a list of IDs and general information about debug logs.

optionalFlags.name: --json
optionalFlags.description: Format output as json.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --api-version
optionalFlags.description: Override the api version used for api requests made by this command.

requiredFlags.name: --target-org
requiredFlags.description: Username or alias of the target org. Not required if the target-org configuration variable is already set.

commands.name: apex run
commands.description: Execute anonymous Apex code entered on the command line or from a local file.

optionalFlags.name: --json
optionalFlags.description: Format output as json.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --api-version
optionalFlags.description: Override the api version used for api requests made by this command.

optionalFlags.name: --file
optionalFlags.description: Path to a local file that contains Apex code.

requiredFlags.name: --target-org
requiredFlags.description: Username or alias of the target org. Not required if the target-org configuration variable is already set.

commands.name: apex run test
commands.description: Invoke Apex tests in an org.

optionalFlags.name: --json
optionalFlags.description: Format output as json.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --api-version
optionalFlags.description: Override the api version used for api requests made by this command.

optionalFlags.name: --code-coverage
optionalFlags.description: Retrieve code coverage results.

optionalFlags.name: --output-dir
optionalFlags.description: Directory in which to store test run files.

optionalFlags.name: --test-level
optionalFlags.description: Level of tests to run; default is RunLocalTests. Permissible values are: RunLocalTests, RunAllTestsInOrg, RunSpecifiedTests.

optionalFlags.name: --class-names
optionalFlags.description: Apex test class names to run; default is all classes. If you select --class-names, you can't specify --suite-names or --tests. For multiple classes, repeat the flag for each.

optionalFlags.name: --result-format
optionalFlags.description: Format of the test results. Permissible values are: human, tap, junit, json. Default value: human.

optionalFlags.name: --suite-names
optionalFlags.description: Apex test suite names to run. If you select --suite-names, you can't specify --class-names or --tests. For multiple suites, repeat the flag for each.

optionalFlags.name: --tests
optionalFlags.description: Apex test class names or IDs and, if applicable, test methods to run; default is all tests. If you specify --tests, you can't specify --class-names or --suite-names. For multiple tests, repeat the flag for each.

optionalFlags.name: --wait
optionalFlags.description: Sets the streaming client socket timeout in minutes; specify a longer wait time if timeouts occur frequently.

optionalFlags.name: --synchronous
optionalFlags.description: Runs test methods from a single Apex class synchronously; if not specified, tests are run asynchronously.

optionalFlags.name: --detailed-coverage
optionalFlags.description: Display detailed code coverage per test.

optionalFlags.name: --concise
optionalFlags.description: Display only failed test results; works with human-readable output only.

requiredFlags.name: --target-org
requiredFlags.description: Username or alias of the target org. Not required if the target-org configuration variable is already set.

commands.name: apex tail log
commands.description: Activate debug logging and display logs in the terminal.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --api-version
optionalFlags.description: Override the api version used for api requests made by this command.

optionalFlags.name: --color
optionalFlags.description: Apply default colors to noteworthy log lines.

optionalFlags.name: --debug-level
optionalFlags.description: Debug level to set on the DEVELOPER_LOG trace flag for your user.

optionalFlags.name: --skip-trace-flag
optionalFlags.description: Skip trace flag setup. Assumes that a trace flag and debug level are fully set up.

requiredFlags.name: --target-org
requiredFlags.description: Username or alias of the target org. Not required if the target-org configuration variable is already set.
